problems.title: Check Character Type
problems.description:
Given a character, determine and print its type:
- Alphabet: Print "Alphabet"
- Digit: Print "Digit"
- Special Character: Print "Special Character"

Input Format:
Single character.

Output Format:
Print "Alphabet", "Digit", or "Special Character".
problems.examples:
Sample Input
A

Sample Output
Alphabet

Sample Input
5

Sample Output
Digit

Sample Input
@

Sample Output
Special Character

Explanation:
Use conditional statements to check if character is alphabet, digit, or special character.
problems.constraints: Input is a single printable ASCII character
hintsList: Check if character is between 'a'-'z' or 'A'-'Z' (Alphabet), then check if between '0'-'9' (Digit), else it's Special Character.
